text: I don t want to but I think I m getting closer to not being able to stop myself this timeI have really serious mental health issues  I was diagnosed with borderline personality disorder at the beginning of this year and that has been a roller coaster that I can t tell pretty much anyone about because the stigma about bpd is horrendous so I constantly feel alone  Everyone says I ll never have stable or healthy relationships because people with bpd  can t  and that makes me want to die all by itself because I hate to be alone  I am just so tired and lonely and sad that at this point I can t get anything done  I m taking a fifth year in college right now because I was hospitalized twice so I couldn t finish on time but now I m failing all of my classes  all of my friends have moved away because they graduated  I think I m letting my parents down so I haven t told them I m doing so bad and come the end of this semester I ll probably have failed out of college I don t want to be alive and have never felt as if I d be sad or afraid to die  my only problem is that I don t want to hurt those that I live and also I m terrified of an attempt not working  It s so hard to continue living only for others though  only so they re not hurt  I m just so tired and I feel like I get closer everyday  I ve been cutting like crazy again and basically running out of concealable space and every time I see my therapist something just seems to come over me where I feel great and can t remember to tell her everything bad that s happening and then I leave and feel shameful that I couldn t tell the truth  I feel like a failure even at therapy because I can t tell her what s going on  I don t know what to do
summary: Bridget was diagnosed with borderline personality disorder at the beginning of this year. She is taking a fifth year in college because she was hospitalized twice and she couldn't finish on time. Now she's failing all of her classes and her friends have moved away because they graduated. She's cutting again and she's afraid of an attempt not working.
cleaned: bridget diagnose borderline personality disorder beginning year take fifth year college hospitalize twice not finish time fail class friend move away graduate cut afraid attempt not work
